price: Then if you turn away[17], what else can be expected but that you will spread corruption in the land and sever your ties of kinship[18]?
arabic: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَن تُفۡسِدُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّعُوٓاْ أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ
footnotes:
[17] From Islam or from struggling in the way of Allah.
 [18] As you used to do in the pre-Islamic period of ignorance.
